title: Elden Ring - Lands Between
description: Test your knowledge about FromSoftware's open-world masterpiece. No major story spoilers.

questions.question: Who collaborated with FromSoftware to create Elden Ring's lore?
questions.explanation: George R.R. Martin, author of Game of Thrones, helped craft the world's mythology and backstory.

questions.question: What is the player character called in Elden Ring?
questions.explanation: The player is a Tarnished, one of the exiled who return to claim the Elden Ring.

questions.question: What is the name of the grace checkpoints in the game?
questions.explanation: Sites of Grace replace Dark Souls' bonfires as rest points and fast travel locations.

questions.question: What is the spectral horse's name?
questions.explanation: Torrent is your faithful spectral steed companion throughout the Lands Between.

questions.question: Who is the demigod boss of Stormveil Castle?
questions.explanation: Godrick the Grafted is the first major demigod boss, known for grafting limbs onto himself.

questions.question: What year was Elden Ring released?
questions.explanation: Elden Ring launched in February 2022 to critical acclaim and commercial success.

questions.question: What is the maximum player level?
questions.explanation: The maximum level is 713, achieved by maxing all eight stats to 99.

questions.question: Which demigod is known as 'The Blade of Miquella'?
questions.explanation: Malenia, Blade of Miquella, is one of the hardest bosses and has never known defeat.

questions.question: What are the spirit summons called that assist players?
questions.explanation: Spirit Ashes (or Ashes) can be summoned using FP to aid in combat.

questions.question: What is the name of the DLC expansion?
questions.explanation: Shadow of the Erdtree is the major DLC expansion announced for Elden Ring.
